includedAssets.title: The Purge
includedAssets.synopsis: A family are subjected to a night of terror when the government makes all crimes legal for 12 hours.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A family are subjected to a night of terror when the government makes all crimes legal for 12 hours.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A family are subjected to a night of terror when the government makes all crimes legal for 12 hours.
includedAssets.guidanceText: flashing images, strong language, mature themes, violence

includedAssets.title: The Purge: Anarchy
includedAssets.synopsis: With all crime legal for one night, a group of strangers attempt to survive on the streets of Los Angeles. Dark thriller sequel.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: With all crime legal for one night, a group of strangers attempt to survive on the streets of Los Angeles. Dark thriller sequel.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: With all crime legal for one night, a group of strangers attempt to survive on the streets of Los Angeles. Dark thriller sequel.

includedAssets.title: The Purge Movie Box Set
includedAssets.synopsis: In a chilling dystopic America, carnage descends for a 12 hour period every year when all laws are suspended as part of the 'Purge'. Citizens are forced to protect themselves from onetime friends and neighbours, along with the sinister 'New Founding Fathers of America', as everyone discovers who they can really trust. Action horror starring Ethan Hawke and Frank Grillo.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: In a dystopic America, carnage descends for 12 hours when laws are suspended as part of the 'Purge'. Horror with Ethan Hawke and Frank Grillo.

Citizens are forced to protect themselves from onetime friends and neighbours, along with the sinister 'New Founding Fathers of America', as everyone discovers who they can really trust.
